name: Crazy Driver Taxi Ambulance
description:
Transport the ill to the hospital, make sure your route across the huge city is the fastest possible

Crazy Driver Taxi Ambulance game features
- Realistic city environments and smooth 3D graphics easy and addictive gameplay
- Challenging rescue simulator 3D game, act fast and be on time
- On-screen easy driving simulator controls, precession controls
- Amazing sound rescue simulator sound effect
